descriptions:
They knock down flying prey by firing
compressed water from their massive
claws like shooting a pistol.

Through controlled explosions of internal gas,
it can expel water like a pistol shot.
At close distances, it can shatter rock.

They knock down flying prey by firing
compressed water from their massive
claws like shooting a pistol.

Through controlled explosions of internal gas,
it can expel water like a pistol shot.
At close distances, it can shatter rock.

Its claws occasionally fall off, and it keeps a low
profile until they grow back. The meat of its
claws is so delicious!

It moves around by jetting water from its right
pincer. It has a poor sense of balance, so it’s
terrible at swimming straight.

Clauncher’s claws can fall off during battle, but
they’ll regenerate. The meat inside the claws is
popular as a delicacy in Galar.

By detonating gas that accumulates in its right
claw, this Pokémon launches water like a bullet.
This is how Clauncher defeats its enemies.
name: Clauncher
